div.div: In partnership with the community, the Pembroke Central School District is committed to knowing each individual student’s interests, needs and desires in order to prepare all students for graduation, with the knowledge, skills and attitudes necessary to lead productive lives.

a.title: 4th Grade Field Trip to Historic Palace Theater
a.span: 4th Grade Field Trip to Historic Palace Theater

div.p: With regard to the Pembroke Central School District (PCSD) web site and any official PCSD web presence developed, maintained or offered through PCSD sources, PCSD is committed to complying with the provisions of Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973. Pembroke Central School District is in the process of transitioning its websites and web-based resources to more accessible formats. The goal is to provide students, parents and members of the public with disabilities the ability to independently acquire the same information, engage in the same interactions, and enjoy the same benefits and services as those without disabilities, with equivalent ease of use.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
